author: Azure
install_msg: The RoleTransfer cog has been installed! Users with the required role can now use `[p]transferroles`.
name: RoleTransfer
short: Transfers roles from one member to another.
description: Provides a `transferroles` command for authorized users. It copies all manageable, non-admin roles from an old user to a new user, removes the roles from the old user, and assigns them a specified quarantine role.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any user data.
